gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 115, Hornets 99
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Hornets, 115-99. Pascal Siakam led the way with 25 points, nine assists, and eight rebounds for the Pacers, while Aaron Nesmith added 22 points and eight rebounds in the victory. Brandon Miller notched a career-high 35 points along with six rebounds for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Pacers improve to 28-23, while the Hornets fall to 10-38.
